question: The Union Cabinet has approved MoU with which country on cooperation in space exploration?
explanation:
The Union Cabinet has approved the Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between India and Nigeria on cooperation in the exploration and using outer space for peaceful purposes.
The MoU has been signed between Indian Space Research Organisation and the National Space Research and Development Agency (NASRDA) of Nigeria. The countries will set up a joint working group to implement the process.
